name: FoxTail
description: FoxTail is a classic quest inspired by the mid-90s games. Complex quests and freedom in solving them, an interesting plot, beautiful graphics and, of course, an atmosphere of mystery and adventure.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 Processor: Pentium III 800 MHz Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: SVGA videoadapter DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: RAM - 128 Mb, DirectX 9.0c or OpenGL
